title: Pipelife takes leading position in electrical installations market
content: Acquisitions as well as investments into production efficiency and capacity, have quickly propelled Pipelife into a market leading position. The extended product portfolio and combined competences have sparked the development of a prefabricated solution that is fully new to the market.

title: 22-km-outfall for Europe's largest goldmine successfully implemented
content: A roughly 22-kilometer-long outfall pipe was built at the Kittilä goldmine in Finland as part of the mine’s environmental investment program. Good partnerships and cooperation ensured a successful implementation.

title: Decarbonizing economy with sustainable hydrogen infrastructure
content: Many experts see hydrogen as viable candidate in helping us towards a carbon freer economy. Our solutions provide all we need for safe, lasting, and cost-efficient hydrogen infrastructure.

title: World’s longest freight transport through the Suez Canal
content: 6,722 meters of large diameter PE Pipes are hauled 16,300 kilometers to Bangladesh. The convoy is over 1 kilometer long and is the longest freight transport ever to go through the Suez Canal.

title: Advancing Plastics Recycling: Opportunities and challenges on the way to a circular economy
content: Pipelife has set itself ambitious recycling targets supporting the EU Plastics Strategy and contributing to the advancement of a circular economy.
